Psalms__69.1: Unto the end, a psalm for David, to bring to remembrance that the Lord saved him.
Psalms__69.2: O God, come to my assistance; O Lord, make haste to help me.
Psalms__69.3: Let them be confounded and ashamed that seek my soul:
Psalms__69.4:
Let them be turned backward, and blush for shame that desire evils to me: Let them be presently turned away blushing for shame that say to me:<u>
                Tis well, tis well
               </u>.
Psalms__69.5: Let all that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee; and let such as love thy salvation say always: The Lord be magnified.
Psalms__69.6: But I am needy and poor; O God, help me. Thou art my helper and my deliverer: O Lord, make no delay.
